original_text: God teaches all his children not to do wrong things. So if he does not punish you, it shows that you are not really his children. Instead, you are like children who do not really belong to him. God teaches all his children not to do wrong things. So if he does not punish you, it shows that you are not really his children. Instead, you are like children who do not really belong to him.
korean_text: 징계는 다 받는 것이거늘 너희에게 없으면 사생자요 친아들이 아니니라

sentences.original_text: So if he does not punish you
it shows that you are not really his children
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 정말 그의 자녀가 아니라는 것을 보여줍니다

sentences.original_text: you are like children who do not really belong to him
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 정말 그에게 속하지 않는 자녀들과 같습니다

sentences.original_text: So if he does not punish you
it shows that you are not really his children
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 정말 그의 자녀가 아니라는 것을 보여줍니다
